Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing and retrieving settings easily.

    aschmid

      • getInt

        public static int getInt(java.lang.String name,
         int def)
        Gets a setting
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the setting
        def - The value if the setting wasn't found
        Returns:
        The value of a setting, or def if it doesn't exist

      • setInt

        public static void setInt(java.lang.String name,
          int value)
        Stores a setting
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the setting
        value - The value to store for this setting
